function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Optimization of PCR conditions may result in false-positive results.","Impact":"Incorrect diagnosis and unnecessary panic or measures.","Mitigation":"Regular calibration and validation of PCR conditions, use of appropriate controls, and confirmation of results through sequencing.","Technologies":"PCR calibration technologies, sequencing technologies.","People":"Laboratory technicians, researchers, public health officials.","Owner":"Laboratories, research institutions, public health organizations."},{"Description":"Accumulation of extraneous nucleic acids during the concentration process of wastewater samples.","Impact":"Interference with PCR leading to false-positive results.","Mitigation":"Use of filter units with appropriate cut-off sizes, regular quality control checks for concentration process.","Technologies":"Filter units with specific cut-off sizes, quality control measures.","People":"Laboratory technicians, researchers.","Owner":"Research institutions, laboratories."},{"Description":"Untested retention of wastewater samples before the SARS-CoV-2 pandemic as control.","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of the presence of SARS-CoV-2 in wastewater samples.","Mitigation":"Retesting of retained wastewater samples using independent methods, such as gel electrophoresis or sequencing.","Technologies":"Gel electrophoresis, sequencing technologies.","People":"Laboratory technicians, researchers.","Owner":"Research institutions, laboratories."}]}
